itunes:title: 47. How to Homestead in Suburbia
title: 47. How to Homestead in Suburbia
description: Do you ever dream of the homestead life, but shutter at the thought of living so far away from town?  I can’t even begin to count the number of people that’ve voiced this exact concern over the years.  Don’t worry.  I get it.  The full-on homestead life isn’t necessarily for everyone.  Don’t fret my friends, today I’m here to offer up ideas on how you can get a taste of the homestead life without ever leaving suburbia.  On this episode I cover everything from gardening to keeping your own animals.  This is a must listen for anyone that wants to get a taste of the homestead life!
content:encoded: Do you ever dream of the homestead life, but shutter at the thought of living so far away from town?  I can’t even begin to count the number of people that’ve voiced this exact concern over the years.  Don’t worry.  I get it.  The full-on homestead life isn’t necessarily for everyone.  Don’t fret my friends, today I’m here to offer up ideas on how you can get a taste of the homestead life without ever leaving suburbia.  On this episode I cover everything from gardening to keeping your own animals.  This is a must listen for anyone that wants to get a taste of the homestead life!
itunes:author: Jill Winger
